name: Dungeon Commander (Dan Ruscoe)
description:
Are you Dungeon Commander material? Take control of goblin hoards, swarm your enemies, and banish them from each plane of existence on your way to the world above.

HOW TO PLAY

Each battle has the same goal - destroy the enemy's obelisk while keeping your own obelisk safe.

Spawn goblins by clicking their pictures on the right of your screen. Remember, you must have enough Dark Energy to pay for your goblins! You will gain Dark Energy automatically as long as your obelisk is standing.

Click anywhere on the map to instruct your goblins to move there. Goblins will attack any enemy within their range.

CONTROLS

Move your mouse to look around.

Click the left mouse button to interact when you see the mouse icon.

W = Walk forward

S = Walk backwards

A = Walk left

D = Walk right

Press Escape at any time to return to the main menu.

BATTLE CONTROLS

Move around the map by holding down the right mouse button and moving your mouse.

Zoom in and out using your mouse scroll wheel.

Direct your goblins by clicking anywhere on the map.
